medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started suddenly when the patient woke up in the morning; the pain was described as constant and band-like, and lasted for 1 day. The patient reports nausea and dry heaves following the onset of pain, with chills accompanying the pain. Initially, the pain was severe but has improved with medication.
medical_history.social_history: Patient consumes approximately 2 alcoholic drinks daily, with the last drink being a pistachio martini prior to admission.
